channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump DOJ tells Supreme Court that fired special counsel is delaying other firings
item.description: The Trump administration complained to the Supreme Court that one of the people it's trying to fire, special counsel Hampton Dellinger, is positioning...

item.title: Senate panel advances fentanyl scheduling bill, pushing long-debated change toward law
item.description: A Senate panel advanced legislation Thursday that would permanently put fentanyl and its chemical cousins on the Schedule I list of controlled substan...

item.title: White House's Easter Egg Roll is a go amid soaring egg prices
item.description: The White House announced Thursday that it will host its Easter Egg Roll on April 21, even as the price of eggs skyrocket.

item.title: The Bishops Are Right to Sue the Federal Government over Refugee Resettlement
item.description: Whatever the outcome of the case, the Catholic Church’s mission to assist legally admitted refugees is clear and convincing.

item.title: A Modest Republican Budget Plan
item.description: Far from being draconian, the House-passed budget resolution would cut spending by a relatively small amount.

item.title: Treasury Secretary eyes U.S. Postal Service takeover of Census count
item.description: The Trump administration wants to use the U.S. Postal Service to conduct the U.S. Census.

item.title: Labor Secretary nominee Lori Chavez-DeRemer advances out of Senate committee
item.description: A Senate panel advanced President Trump's nominee for labor secretary, Lori Chavez-DeRemer, on Thursday.

item.title: Trump Should Take a Bite out of Nonsensical Laws
item.description: An insane number of things are classified as federal crimes, and that doesn’t even include the labyrinth of federal rules Americans are subject to.

item.title: A Wild Journey Through My Emails
item.description: Want an advance copy of a ‘bilingual poetry workbook’ exploring ‘activism, healing, and liberation by uplifting the legacy of LGBTQ+, Trans Latine com...
